name: Demelia's Isle
description:
Demelia's Isle is a RPG third person in an Open World. Explore, Fight improve your equipment to defeat demonic forces that are once again awakening in this isolated realm.
Your adventure will take you to the most remote places of this open world, the island of Demelia, where many dungeons and demonic creatures await you.
It's up to you to assess whether you prefer to attack head-on or be as discreet as possible. Avoid deadly traps set for you, and scour dungeons in search of secrets.
The world of Demelia will evolve as you progress and the night will bring new dangers and quests.

CHARACTERISTICS:
  • Be as you like: Customize your character's appearance as you see fit.
  • The world is changing: Your progress in the main and side quests will change the elements of the world and unlock new things, such as access to new dungeons and better weapons.
  • Be curious: Explore the island and discover all the hidden treasures and dungeons, the more curious you are, the more rewarded you will be.
  • Day/night cycle: At night new and more dangerous creatures will appear, be ready to face them as some quests must be done at night.
  • Survive together: You can play co-op with up 2 of your friends.
